main.not_support: Current script configuration type is not SNI, this feature is not available

full_installation.title: Installation Flow
full_installation.info1: Stable version, Vision+Reality, block bt, cn, ads, enable geodata auto-update

xray_version.title: Xray Version
xray_version.info3: Custom versions may have config compatibility issues

protocol_config.title: Protocol Config
protocol_config.info1: mKCP sacrifices bandwidth to reduce latency.
protocol_config.info2: XTLS(Vision) solves TLS in TLS issue
protocol_config.info3_1: XHTTP has multiplexing by default, lower latency than Vision
protocol_config.info3_2: v2rayN&G clients have global mux.cool settings, disable before using XHTTP
protocol_config.info5: Use VLESS+Vision+REALITY fallback to VLESS+XHTTP on port 443
protocol_config.info6: SNI-based split through Nginx on port 443, supports CDN and direct connection

web_config.title: Web Config
web_config.info2: First registered user in Cloudreve v4 becomes admin

config_management.title: Configuration Management
config_management.info3: Includes Nginx update, domain change, web config

route_management.title: Custom Routing
route_management.info1: WARP Proxy is deployed via Docker, Docker will be auto-installed.
route_management.info3: Re-applying WARP account frequently may get IP banned by Cloudflare.
route_management.info4: Clear WARP container log files and reset the container.
route_management.info5: Add IP-based block route to ruleTag block-ip.
route_management.info6: Add domain-based block route to ruleTag block-domain.
route_management.info7: (WARP must be enabled) Add WARP IP route to ruleTag warp-ip.
route_management.info8: (WARP must be enabled) Add WARP domain route to ruleTag warp-domain.

warp.status: WARP PROXY is disabled, unable to add WARP routing

read.uuid: Enter UUID (custom string supported, default auto-generated):
read.fallback: Enter Fallback UUID (custom string supported, default auto-generated):

read.warp_domain: Enter domain to route to WARP
read.block_ip: Enter IP to route to block
read.block_domain: Enter domain to route to block

port.empty: Input is empty, will be auto-configured

uuid.string: Input is a plain string, will be mapped to UUID by Xray

password.empty: Input is empty, will auto-generate password
password.length_error: Password must be at least 8 characters:

path.empty: Path is empty, will auto-generate random path

short.length_error: Length must be even and between 2-16:

domain.empty: Input is empty, will randomly select a domain from config
